00072   class LCEventModifier : public IMPL::LCEventImpl {
00073   public:
00074     static void deleteCollection(LCEvent *r, const std::string &name) {
00075       //LCEventModifier *m((LCEventModifier*)r);
00076       LCEventModifier *m((LCEventModifier*)dynamic_cast<LCEventImpl*>(r));
00077       assert(m!=0);
00078 
00079       m->setReadOnly(false);
00080 
00081       m->removeCollection(name);
00082 
00083       m->setReadOnly(true);
00084     }
